content:
In the upgrade notes for 6.3:
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v6.3

In step 9 - setting the "feature flag" - jvm-option is in what file?
I assume domain1/config/domain.xml

  1. Enable the Metadata Source facet for harvested content (Optional):

If you choose to enable this new feature, set the optional feature flag (jvm option)Â dataverse.feature.index-harvested-metadata-source=trueÂ before reindexing.
Sherry Lake has marked this topic as resolved.
